alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Florence, southwestern Dillon, east central Darlington, northwestern Marion and south central Marlboro Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brownsville, or 12 miles east of Darlington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Latta, Sellers, Brownsville, Oak Grove, Blue Brick and Mechanicsville. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 168 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
